Synopsis: Creates a breakpoint that only fires when PowerShell encounters an error

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Enable-BreakOnError
ID Script           Line Command         Variable        Action
-- ------           ---- -------         --------        ------
 0                       Out-Default                     ...

PS > 1/0
Entering debug mode. Use h or ? for help.

Hit Command breakpoint on 'Out-Default'


PS > $error
Attempted to divide by zero.
